meanings.sent1: She enameled the jewelry to make it shiny.
meanings.sent2: The artist enameled the metal vase with colorful designs.
meanings.sent3: The chef enameled the cake with a beautiful floral pattern.
meanings.sent4: Her words enameled his heart with love and warmth.
meanings.sent5: The sun enameled the sky with vibrant hues at sunset.

meanings.sent1: The enameled surface of the car sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: She admired the enameled finish on the antique vase.
meanings.sent3: The enameled shield protected the knight in battle.
meanings.sent4: The enameled cup gleamed on the shelf like a precious gem.
meanings.sent5: The enameled sign caught the eye of passersby with its brilliance.
